ovdesc.p: Summary: This Application will allow you:

1) To change your Password. 2) To access the records of another Company. 3) To set up, or change, dates between which your Password should be deactivated to prevent anyone else using your Password, for example, while you are on holiday.
To Use: ACTION LINE Enter PASSWORD then: Enter: 1 - To change your Password Enter: 2 - To access another Company Enter: 3 - To Deactivate your Password (Refer to Details)
Details: 1) When changing your Password: Your Password must be between 6 and 16, type A (alphanumeric) characters and may not be the same as the last 2 or USER ID or SIGN ON NAME.

2) When accessing another Company: (i) Company Code or Mnemonic must be entered. The format of a Company code is CCGGGLLLL. Where CC is the Country code, GGG is the Company.Group Code, and LLLL is a unique local code. Mnemonic company codes are 1-5 type MNE (uppercase alpha or numeric or '.') characters. (ii) You will not be permitted to access records in another Company unless it is specified in your User Profile.
3) When deactivating your Password: (i) Deactivate Date To may not be less than Deactivate Date From but they can both be the same date. (ii) Both dates must be greater than today's date.
Note: To Return without changing anything: Press F1 and Enter Y in response to the message YOU CHANGED NOTHING.
